About Me

Transforming Data into Strategic Insights

Accomplished Principal Data Scientist and Microsoft Solutions Architect with 25+ years of experience delivering data-driven solutions across enterprise software, government, and defense sectors. Proven expertise in machine learning, statistical analysis, and transforming complex business challenges into actionable insights through advanced analytics. Demonstrated success in customer-facing consulting, project delivery, and building scalable data science solutions that drive business impact. Deep Microsoft ecosystem knowledge with extensive SharePoint, Azure, and cloud computing experience.

Beyond Technology
